complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Setup ERPNext v15 Foundation and Workshop Configuration System
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the ERPNext v15 setup into: 1) Installation and Arabic localization configuration, 2) Custom DocType creation for workshop profiles, 3) Backend validation logic development, 4) Web form UI implementation, and 5) System integration and testing
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity due to multilingual support, custom DocType creation, and integration requirements. Current 5 subtasks are appropriate for the scope.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Implement License Management and Security Framework
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Expand into: 1) JWT authentication with RS256, 2) Hardware fingerprinting system, 3) Business binding and verification, 4) Offline grace period management, 5) Security monitoring and audit logging, and 6) Integration testing and deployment
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Very high complexity involving cryptography, hardware detection, government API integration, and security monitoring. Recommend adding integration testing subtask to current 5.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Develop Customer Management System with CRM Integration
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Structure as: 1) ERPNext Customer DocType extension, 2) Elasticsearch fuzzy search implementation, 3) Customer satisfaction tracking system, 4) Loyalty program management, and 5) Analytics dashboard development
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Moderate-high complexity with multilingual support, external service integration, and analytics. Current 5 subtasks provide good coverage.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Build Vehicle Management and Registry System
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Divide into: 1) Vehicle DocType creation with relationships, 2) VIN decoder API integration, 3) Service history tracking system, 4) Predictive maintenance alerts, and 5) Document storage and inspection module
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Moderate complexity with API integration and document management. Current 5 subtasks appropriately cover all requirements.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Create Parts Inventory Management with Barcode Integration
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down as: 1) ERPNext Item/Stock module extension, 2) Barcode/QR integration with ZXing, 3) Multi-location stock management, 4) Automated reordering and supplier tracking, and 5) Demand forecasting implementation
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Moderate-high complexity due to barcode integration, multi-location management, and forecasting algorithms. Current 5 subtasks are well-structured.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Develop Workshop Management and Service Order System
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Structure as: 1) Service Order DocType with status tracking, 2) Calendar-based scheduling with FullCalendar.js, 3) Technician assignment algorithm, 4) Mobile PWA interface development, and 5) Quality control and monitoring dashboard
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity involving calendar integration, mobile PWA development, and algorithm implementation. Current 5 subtasks provide comprehensive coverage.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Build SMS/WhatsApp Communication Integration
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Organize as: 1) Twilio and WhatsApp API setup, 2) Redis message queuing system, 3) Dynamic template system, 4) Communication history and compliance management, and 5) Delivery tracking and monitoring
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Moderate complexity with external API integration and queuing system. Current 5 subtasks cover all functional requirements effectively.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Develop Customer Portal with Online Service Booking
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Structure as: 1) Portal foundation with authentication, 2) Account management and profile features, 3) Real-time appointment booking, 4) Service request tracking, and 5) SMS/WhatsApp integration
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Moderate complexity with web portal development and real-time features. Current 5 subtasks provide logical progression and complete coverage.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Create Scrap Management and Vehicle Dismantling System
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Organize as: 1) Scrap Vehicle DocType with condition assessment, 2) Virtual disassembly planning system, 3) Parts grading and documentation, 4) Storage location management with barcodes, and 5) Sales channel integration and profit analysis
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Moderate complexity with specialized business logic and marketplace integration. Current 5 subtasks cover the complete workflow effectively.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Implement Data Migration and Legacy System Integration
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down as: 1) Core migration framework with multi-format support, 2) Data validation and cleansing engine, 3) Transaction management and rollback system, 4) Legacy system field mapping tools, and 5) Progress tracking and reporting dashboard
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Moderate complexity involving data transformation, validation, and migration workflows. Current 5 subtasks provide comprehensive coverage of migration requirements.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Build Analytics Dashboard and Reporting Suite
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Structure as: 1) Analytics infrastructure and data models, 2) Executive dashboard with KPI visualization, 3) Operational reports and analytics, 4) Financial analytics and customer insights, and 5) Report scheduling and export system
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Moderate complexity with data aggregation, visualization, and reporting automation. Current 5 subtasks logically separate concerns and provide complete functionality.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Develop Mobile Application for Technicians
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Organize as: 1) PWA foundation with offline architecture, 2) Job assignment and work order management, 3) Time tracking and break management, 4) Media capture and barcode scanning, and 5) Push notifications and final integration
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Moderate-high complexity due to PWA development, offline capabilities, and mobile-specific features. Current 5 subtasks provide good progression from foundation to advanced features.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Implement User Training System and Documentation
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break into: 1) Interactive training module framework setup, 2) Progress tracking and competency system, 3) Role-based training paths, 4) Multilingual documentation and knowledge base, and 5) Contextual help system integration
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Moderate complexity with content management and learning systems. Current 5 subtasks appropriately separate technical implementation from content creation.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Conduct System Integration Testing and Performance Optimization
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Structure as: 1) End-to-end integration testing framework, 2) Load testing and performance benchmarking, 3) Database and application optimization, 4) Security testing and vulnerability assessment, and 5) Production deployment and monitoring infrastructure
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity involving comprehensive testing, performance optimization, and production deployment. Current 5 subtasks cover all critical aspects of system readiness.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Implement Billing System with Omani VAT Compliance
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the implementation of a billing system with Omani VAT compliance into detailed subtasks covering: requirements analysis, ERPNext customization, bilingual invoice template development, VAT logic implementation, QR code generation per Oman e-Invoice spec, multi-currency integration, payment gateway integration, receivables management, financial reporting, user training, and compliance testing.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This task involves extensive customization of ERPNext, compliance with specific Omani VAT and e-invoice regulations, bilingual template development, QR code generation, multi-currency support, payment gateway integration, receivables management, and advanced financial reporting. Each area requires specialized knowledge, integration with external APIs, and rigorous compliance testing, making the overall complexity very high. The breadth and regulatory depth justify a high number of subtasks to ensure thorough coverage and risk mitigation.[2][3][4][5]

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Visual Identity & Branding System Implementation
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the implementation into subtasks such as onboarding wizard extension, logo upload and validation, dynamic logo injection, theme system creation, print format integration, image optimization, and dark mode toggle.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This task involves multiple cross-cutting concerns: UI/UX, image processing, ERPNext theming, RTL support, and integration with print formats. The need for dynamic theming, file validation, and persistent settings increases both cyclomatic and cognitive complexity, warranting a high score and several focused subtasks.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: User Management & Security Framework
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Expand into subtasks for role/permission modeling, custom permission engine, security dashboard, MFA integration, session management, audit trail extension, security alerts, and documentation.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Security frameworks are inherently complex due to the need for granular access control, real-time monitoring, MFA, and auditability. The integration with ERPNext's hooks and custom scripts, plus the need for compliance and monitoring, makes this a high-complexity, multi-faceted task.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Core Workshop Dashboard Development
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Decompose into subtasks for dashboard layout, real-time KPI integration, service status board, inventory alerts, quick action toolbar, performance visualizations, and auto-refresh logic.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Building a real-time, interactive dashboard with multiple data sources, live updates, and responsive design requires significant coordination between backend, frontend, and real-time systems, resulting in high cyclomatic and cognitive complexity.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Sales & Service Interface Implementation
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Expand into subtasks for service estimate doctype, parts auto-suggestion, order conversion workflow, progress tracking, customer notifications, labor time tracking, quality control, VAT calculation, and mobile interface.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This task covers a full sales workflow with custom doctypes, automation, notifications, compliance, and mobile support. The breadth and depth of integration across ERPNext modules and external APIs drive up complexity.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Purchasing & Supplier Management System
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down into subtasks for multi-supplier comparison, supplier scorecard, automated reorder, approval workflow, goods receipt processing, cost analysis dashboard, mobile receiving interface, and quality inspection integration.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Procurement systems require robust data modeling, workflow automation, analytics, and mobile support. The need for supplier performance tracking and integration with inventory and analytics increases the complexity.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Advanced Inventory Management Interface
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Decompose into subtasks for advanced search, barcode scanning, cycle counting, stock transfer workflow, ABC analysis, parts compatibility matrix, PWA mobile interface, offline capability, and auto-sync logic.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This task involves real-time inventory tracking, barcode integration, offline-first mobile design, and advanced analytics. The technical breadth and need for reliability and accuracy make this highly complex.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Customer Service Portal Development
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Expand into subtasks for portal setup, appointment booking, service tracking, online payments, feedback system, document storage, SMS/WhatsApp integration, and authentication.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: A customer portal with scheduling, payments, notifications, and document management requires secure integration of multiple systems and user-facing features, resulting in high complexity.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Scrap Vehicle Processing System
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down into subtasks for scrap vehicle doctype, condition assessment, dismantling workflow, parts grading, storage management, marketplace integration, and compliance documentation.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: While this task is specialized, it involves workflow automation, integration with external marketplaces, and compliance tracking, making it moderately complex but slightly less so than core operational modules.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Financial Management & Reporting Suite
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Decompose into subtasks for accounts workflow extension, receivables management, cash flow forecasting, P&L reporting, VAT compliance, cost center analysis, budget planning, automated reminders, and financial analytics.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Financial systems require accuracy, compliance, automation, and analytics. The integration with tax authorities, forecasting, and departmental breakdowns adds significant complexity.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: System Configuration & Maintenance Tools
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Expand into subtasks for system settings UI, automated backup, performance monitoring, license management, integration management, error logging, system health monitoring, and mobile device management.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: System administration tools must be robust, secure, and reliable. The need for automation, monitoring, and device management increases both cyclomatic and maintainability complexity.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Reports & Analytics Engine Implementation
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down into subtasks for reporting suite setup, custom report builder, automated scheduling, interactive dashboards, predictive analytics, benchmark analysis, multi-format export, mobile optimization, data source integration, and user training/documentation.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: A comprehensive BI system with custom report building, predictive analytics, scheduling, and mobile support is extremely complex, requiring advanced backend, frontend, and data science integration. This is the most complex task in the set.
